skillDescription:
I am a passionate innovator who works on creating useful tools which ease out functioning & enable real-time actions resulting in effective operations & greater ROI for businesses.
  I excel at analyzing pain areas, identifying values for any existing workflow or system and thus ideating & implementing new software products from head to tail to address identified concerns. I strive to constantly contribute in resolving day to day problems via frequent connect with people to understand the pain points & then utilize technology innovation to solve them.
profileDescription: I am currently pursuing a Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science at Utah State University. In addition to my studies, I work part-time as an IT assistant for the Biology Department at the same institution. This position provides me with valuable work experience and funds my education. Prior to this, I worked as a full-stack developer at Virtusa in India for two years. I am a goal-oriented individual with high levels of integrity, positive energy, and exceptional interpersonal skills. I am currently seeking a software development engineer role.
